CustomField.description: Subscription Start Date and Subscription End Date are the # of Months for Subs Activation Apart, and if it's a renewal they follow the end date pattern from the last ending subscription period.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Subscription Start Date and Subscription End Date are the # of Months for Subs Activation Apart, and if it's a renewal they follow the end date pattern from the last ending subscription period.
CustomField.label: Subs Start/End # of Months Apart
